alert.note: Alert for Eastern Will; Kankakee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:20PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Will, northeastern Kankakee and southern Lake Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 520 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beecher, or near Lowell, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crown Point, Cedar Lake, Lowell, St. John, Beecher, Lake Dalecarlia, Grant Park, Shelby, Schneider and Sumava Resorts. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 236 and 245. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
